upcoming-movies.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
upcoming-movies.overview: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, our friendly neighborhood web-slinger is unmasked and no longer able to separate his normal life from his superhero responsibilities.

upcoming-movies.title: The Batman
upcoming-movies.overview: In his second year of fighting crime, Batman faces the Riddler, a new villain who is using technology to spread chaos throughout Gotham City.

upcoming-movies.title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
upcoming-movies.overview: Doctor Strange must face his own demons when a mysterious force begins to tear apart the fabric of reality.

upcoming-movies.title: Thor: Love and Thunder
upcoming-movies.overview: Thor, now the king of Asgard, must face a new threat to the universe when a powerful goddess named Gorr the God Butcher begins to hunt down and kill all gods.

upcoming-movies.title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
upcoming-movies.overview: After the death of King T'Challa, Queen Ramonda, Shuri, M'Baku, Okoye, and the Dora Milaje must band together to protect Wakanda from threats both within and outside their borders.

upcoming-movies.title: The Flash
upcoming-movies.overview: When Barry Allen's powers are stolen by a villain, he must team up with his friends and allies to get them back and stop the villain from destroying Central City.

upcoming-movies.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
upcoming-movies.overview: The Guardians of the Galaxy must face their greatest challenge yet when they are forced to confront their own mortality and the consequences of their actions.

upcoming-movies.title: Captain Marvel 2
upcoming-movies.overview: Carol Danvers, aka Captain Marvel, must face a new threat to the universe when a powerful alien warlord begins to conquer planets and destroy entire civilizations.

upcoming-movies.title: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania
upcoming-movies.overview: Scott Lang and Hope van Dyne must team up with their friends and allies to stop a powerful villain from destroying the Quantum Realm and threatening the entire universe.

upcoming-movies.title: Indiana Jones 5
upcoming-movies.overview: Indiana Jones must face his greatest challenge yet when he is forced to confront his own mortality and the consequences of his actions.

reviews.movie_title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
